name: Kinsplant
description:
Made in the space of a week for GBJam10

Semi-online experience. You'll need a connection to play.

Theme: PLANT - To hide something secretly.

WASD + Space

or

Arrow Keys + Z

Somewhere across the 4 realms, another player has planted and hidden the fabled artifact. 
 As one of four kinsman, track down and unearth the artifact and bury it somewhere secret and safe, to prevent further prying hands. 
There's a handful of things going on in the game (plot and mechanics) that I didn't have time to telegraph very well. Points to anyone who catches them.
